description:
Start your classic touring journey on the right foot. These introductory boots prioritize comfort and warmth while offering good mobility, stability, and control, so you can focus on your form as you explore the winter wonderland.

  • Tall cuff and lace covers protect against snow
  • Thinsulate™ insulative lining keeps feet warm
  • Thermoadjustable liners can be heat-moulded for the perfect fit
  • Quick-dry inner linings keep your feet comfortable all day
  • Heel support and touring sole provides stability on fresh trails
  • Lower volume and narrower fit suits smaller feet
name: Rossignol XC-2 FW Classic Boots - Women's
